note.p: American. Daughter of Joseph Savage, ice merchant, and his wife Lydia. Wife of Dr Charles Barnes (1838–94), dentist. Secretary of the Syracuse Botanical Society, 1881.
United States Federal Census 1860 (Syracuse Ward 4, Onondaga, New York 1057), 1880 (Syracuse, Onondaga, New York 211/251A) (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 November 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 November 2020)
